quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger prevents a thousand moments of regret.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: You Were Born To Win, But To Be A Winner, You Must Plan To Win, Prepare To Win, And Expect To Win.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: To Be A Christian Without Prayer Is No More Possible Than To Be Alive Without Breathing.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Solitude is better than the society of evil persons.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: What counts in the ring is what you can do after you're exhausted. The same is true of life.
author: Muhammad Ali
